titles.title: Oh my Soul, thou you be cast down

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Oh my Soul, thou you be cast down
You shall yet, praise your God
Weeping endures, all through the night
Joy comes in, the waking light
I will arise, I will arise, I will arise and bless my God
I will arise, I will arise, I will arise and bless my God
Out of my darkness, into his light
There is no, turning back
For if I fall, I will arise
And turn again to my God
